description: Part of the "Being a woman" series. Observes the changes which occur in the marriage of a middle-aged couple when the wife decides to change her own lifestyle after her children are grown and gone. Raises issues regarding women's roles, sex-role stereotyping, changing expectaions of the female role and the male perception of such topics.
